sentence.Network_en: With hindsight, we'd all do things differently.
sentence.Network_cn: 有了事后的认识，我们都会以不同的方式行事。

sentence.Network_en: With hindsight it is easy to say they should not have released him.
sentence.Network_cn: 事后才说他们本不应该释放他，这倒容易。

sentence.Network_en: With the benefit of hindsight, it is clear we ought to have done more.
sentence.Network_cn: 事后看来，我们显然本该做得更多。

list.abs: 后见之明偏误 (Hindsight bias)，意思是，一件事发生过后，人们却马后炮以为自己在事前对该事件早就很了解。标签： Trading Psych…
...常是“事后诸葛亮”式的判断，也就是心理学家所说的事后偏见（hindsight bias） 。
With hindsight , the whole affair seems implausible ., 事后看来 , 整个事件似乎很难让人相信.

entry.def: Hindsight is the ability to understand and realize something about an event after it has happened, although you did not understand or realize it at the time.

example.ex: With hindsight, we'd all do things differently...
example.tran: 有了事后的认识，我们都会以不同的方式行事。

example.ex: Even with the benefit of hindsight, I doubt I would change anything if I had my time again.
example.tran: 就算是事后已经一切明了，如果让我重来一次，我也不确定自己是否会作出改变。

means.word_mean: 1. understanding the nature of an event after it has happened;

auth_sentence.content: In hindsight, this is only two thirds correct.
auth_sentence.res_content: In hindsight, this is only two thirds correct.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In hindsight, this is only two thirds correct.

auth_sentence.content: Seniors relearn the lesson through hindsight. Wait for it.

auth_sentence.content: Really it's easy to be wise with hindsight.

means.word_mean: 事后的觉悟;事后的聪明

sentences.en: It’s easy to say now what we should have done then—with the wisdom of hind sight!
sentences.cn: 现在说我们当时应该如何做是不难的——这全是事后聪明。
